ದೂರದ ನಂಟ dūrada naṇṭa a distant relative; ದೂರದ ನೆಂಟ dūrada neṇṭa = ದೂರದ ನಂಟ; ದೂರದ ಬಳಗ dūrada baḷaga = ದೂರದ ಸಂಬಂಧ; ದೂರದ ಬೆಟ್ಟ dūrada beṭṭa a thing far enough not to be obtained; a non-achievable target; 2. that which looks beautiful from a distance, though not really so; ದೂರದ ಸಂಬಂಧ dūrada sambandha distant relation; ದೂರ ಬಾರ dūra bāra a long distance; ದೂರ ಮಾಡು dūra māḍu to severe one's relation with; to treat indifferently, unfriendly or with lack of intimacy or lenience; ದೂರವಾಗು dūravāgu to go away; to go to a distant place; 2. to severe one's relation with; to become indifferent, unfriendly or hostile to; to estrange; to alienate; 3. (an evil, danger, etc.) to be warded off or prevented; ದೂರವಿಡು dūraviḍu to keep at a distance; to treat indifferently, unfriendly or with lack of intimacy or lenience; ದೂರವಿರಿಸು dūravirisu = ದೂರವಿಡು; ದೂರ ಸರಿ dūra sari = ದೂರವಾಗು - 1; ದೂರ ಸಾರು dūra sāru = ದೂರವಾಗು - 1; ದೂರದ ಬೆಟ್ಟ ನುಣ್ಣಗೆ dūrada beṭṭa nuṇṇage (prov.) the other side of the field is always green; it is distance that lends enchantment to the view.
